channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3rd time reporting this, 23rd October
item.description:
Overflowing abandoned green bin at the end of sister Mabel’s way path. The bin does NOT belong to any of the residents. People are dropping rubbish around it, please can someone attend to clear it. I’ve reported it three times now and nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sister Mabel's Way, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Horton Builders Flyposter on Pallet outside 3B Hawthorne Road, 23rd October
item.description:
Horton Builders Flyposter on Pallet on pavement outside 3B Hawthorne Road Please fine this company for littering our streets with their advertising junk. I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///cracks.able.actual https://w3w.co/cracks.able.actual

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawthorne Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 23rd October
item.description:
Car been parked for couple of weeks. Shows as taxed & MOT. Taking up space in public parking space. It’s quite obviously not road worthy. Can owner be found?

item.title: One van with smashed window and also many unusued romanian plate cars, 23rd October
item.description:
This vehicle has shattered glass windscreen, which has caused my child and dog to both cut and injure themselves. This is possibly owned by, and at least definitely known to 5 lister walk, as the resident was present when the vehicle was dumped. There are also keep many foreign vehicles in the carpark, which I will send to dvla. They have cctv to watch the vehicles. The area may have previously been peacock housing but i privately rent and I'm more concerned about environmental health issues, than spaces in the car park. It appears people also live in multiple vehicles throughout the close, which is obviously unhygienic, I have seen them also talk to resident of number 5 lister walk. I have reported this also to relevant housing association, even though I'm not a tenant. They advised me to inform bexley council due to environmental matters and illegal residency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bernal Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass Verge Bollard has been ripped out, 23rd October
item.description:
Matter has not been resolved, putting a road cone there is not a resolution. Furthermore now the whole grass verge has been destroyed by a skip lorry today attending and lifting a skip by parking rear wheels on the verge. This is unacceptable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London

item.title: Fly tipping by rented property at mill place, 23rd October
item.description:
Rented properties down mill place are fly tipping on common again a sign should be put up on lamp post to stop this and residents down their should be inform the common is not for fly tipping your waste should be collected from their own properties not fly tipped on the common.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Place, Chislehurst, London

item.title: Sinking road, 23rd October
item.description:
